revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 71:;dovecote tax for the 13th year drachmas 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki2;;Antonia, fatherless (Poualis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 20 obols 5, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 2 obols 5.5 chalki 2, naubion drachmas 2 obol 0.5, surcharges drachmas 5 obol 1 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 56 obols 28) drachmas 16 obols 5.5, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1, kollybos obols 5.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 47 obol 0.5 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 4.5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 5 chalki 2;;and Dioskoros, son of Ischyrion;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 3 obols 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 3, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 2 obol 1.5, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 7 obols 3.5;;and to Chairemonis, daughter of Herakleides (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 247);;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obol 1;;taxes on land in release likewise obols 3, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 4;;and Tauris, daughter of Ptolemaios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 240);;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 2, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas obols 2.5;;in total for the day drachmas 148 obols 17."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
